animeDescription: It is 2911 and the solar system is made up of of 50 planets. I.C Blues, a gambler, makes a bet with the boss of a criminal syndicate known as Bloody God that it is possible to navigate the whole solar system in one year. Helping out Blues is J9-III, made up of Rock, Beat, and Birdy. To clear any obstcles, they have the transforming train-robot Sasuraiger. But the Bloody Syndicate will do anything to ensure the Blues loses the bet.   (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Shaw, Birdy', 'Blues, I.C.', 'MacKenzie, Beat', 'Anlock, Rock', 'Chang, Suzy', 'Kenjo, Jimmy', 'God, Bloody', 'Aurgan, Inspector', 'Richman, D.D.']
